<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get IPFIX Template (v2.0)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/sdwan/v2.0/api/ipfixtemplates/{template_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



List an IPFIX template.

## Request

This is only applicable when the connection to a collector uses the UDP protocol. The default value is 600 seconds.\n","format":"int32","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"options"} required={true} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`APP_DEF_ID_TABLE`, `LINK_QUALITY_METRICS`, `WAN_PATH_ID_TABLE`, `TYPE_INFO_FOR_IPFIX_IE`, `DEVICE_IDENTIFICATION`]"} schema={{"description":"When selected, Options allows export of additional information to the collector that would not be possible with Flow Fields alone. Maz size = 8.\n","items":{"description":"Options","enum":["APP_DEF_ID_TABLE","LINK_QUALITY_METRICS","WAN_PATH_ID_TABLE","TYPE_INFO_FOR_IPFIX_IE","DEVICE_IDENTIFICATION"],"type":"string"},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"tags"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"A information field that can be added to identify the IPFIX local prefix. Maximum 10 Unique tags of length 1024 each are allowed.\n","items":{"description":"Tags","type":"string"},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"template_export_timeout"} required={false} schemaName={"int32"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Indicates how often the device sends the option record information to a collector.
